Title: Relates to prohibiting the release of certain balloons
Summary: Prohibits the release of balloons with exceptions for manned hot air balloons, government-related experiments, and balloons released indoors.
LawCode: Add ยง11-0331, amd ยง71-0923, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the release of balloons
